rtaxref 0.1.0
  • Reference

Retrieve Synonyms associated with a Taxon

Source: R/rt_taxa_synonyms.R
rt_taxa_synonyms.Rd

Retrieve Synonyms associated with a Taxon

rt_taxa_synonyms(id)

Arguments

id

integer(1)
an integer giving the id of the taxon in TaxRef (also called cdNom)

Examples

rt_taxa_synonyms(id = 107003)
#> # A tibble: 8 x 52
#>       id referenceId parentId scientificName authority fullName fullNameHtml
#>    <int>       <int> <lgl>    <chr>          <chr>     <chr>    <chr>       
#> 1  92412      107003 NA       Copodium oxyn… Raf., 18… Copodiu… <i>Copodium…
#> 2 105694      107003 NA       Lepidotis cla… (L.) P.B… Lepidot… <i>Lepidoti…
#> 3 770669      107003 NA       Lycopodium ar… Willd.    Lycopod… <i>Lycopodi…
#> 4 772810      107003 NA       Lycopodium cl… L.        Lycopod… <i>Lycopodi…
#> 5 773347      107003 NA       Lycopodium cl… Vict., 1… Lycopod… <i>Lycopodi…
#> 6 773048      107003 NA       Lycopodium cl… Vict., 1… Lycopod… <i>Lycopodi…
#> 7 107017      107003 NA       Lycopodium of… Neck., 1… Lycopod… <i>Lycopodi…
#> 8 107025      107003 NA       Lycopodium vu… Dill.     Lycopod… <i>Lycopodi…
#> # … with 45 more variables: rankId <chr>, rankName <chr>, referenceName <chr>,
#> #   referenceNameHtml <chr>, frenchVernacularName <chr>,

#> #   orderName <chr>, className <chr>, phylumName <lgl>, kingdomName <chr>,
